    • Uses of IModuleStateManager in org.sensorhub.api.module

      Methods in org.sensorhub.api.module with parameters of type IModuleStateManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IModule.loadState(IModuleStateManager loader)
      Restores the state of this module from info provided by the input stream
      void IModule.saveState(IModuleStateManager saver)
      Saves the state of this module to the provided output stream

    • Uses of IModuleStateManager in org.sensorhub.impl.module

      Classes in org.sensorhub.impl.module that implement IModuleStateManager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultModuleStateManager
      Default implementation of IModuleStateManager that saves info into files.
      A folder is created for each module the first time its state is saved.
      A main file is used for simple type values and a separate file is used for each info stored as an OutputStream.
      Methods in org.sensorhub.impl.module with parameters of type IModuleStateManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractModule.loadState(IModuleStateManager loader) 
      void AbstractModule.saveState(IModuleStateManager saver)
